configurable.i18n_name: WESTERN SHIRT LIGHT STRETCH DENIM ARABIAN SPICE
configurable.i18n_name_de: WESTERN SHIRT LIGHT STRETCH DENIM ARABIAN SPICE
configurable.i18n_name_nl: WESTERN SHIRT LIGHT STRETCH DENIM ARABIAN SPICE
configurable.i18n_name_fr: WESTERN SHIRT LIGHT STRETCH DENIM ARABIAN SPICE
configurable.i18n_name_it: WESTERN SHIRT LIGHT STRETCH DENIM ARABIAN SPICE
configurable.i18n_name_es: WESTERN SHIRT LIGHT STRETCH DENIM ARABIAN SPICE
configurable.i18n_description: The Western Shirt Light Stretch Denim Arabian Spice is a women’s shirt fusing classic Western shirt design details with slim-fitting, feminine tailoring. With stylistas reaching for boy shirts for the new season, 7FAM’s Western Shirt is your go-to piece for the most fashionable barn dance in town. Constructed in a lightweight stretch denim in a unique, multi-tonal rich brown hue, this women’s shirt is catwalk cool in both style and colour.
configurable.i18n_description_de:
• Das Western Shirt Light Stretch Denim Arabian Spice ist eine Mischung aus Western-Hemd-Details und schmalem, femininem Schnitt
  • alle Fashionistas greifen in der neuen Saison zu boy-Hemden
  • 7FAMs Western Shirt ist das ultimative Hemd für den modernsten Scheunentanz der Stadt
  • aus leichtem Stretch-Denim in einzigartigem, mehrfarbigem, sattem Braunton
  • stil- und farbtechnisch absolute Catwalk-Coolness
configurable.i18n_description_nl: Het Western Shirt Light Stretch Denim Arabian Spice is een vrouwenhemd dat details van het klassieke Westernhemd combineert met een getailleerde vrouwelijke snit. Nu fashion addicts vallen voor boyhemden, is de Western Shirt van 7FAM jouw ideale optie voor een trendy boerendans in de stad. Gemaakt van een lichte stretch denim met een unieke, multitonale rijke bruine kleur, is dit vrouwenhemd trendy cool zowel qua stijl als qua kleur.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: La chemise Western pour femme en denim stretch léger version Arabian Spice associe le look des chemises Western originales de 7FAM pour femme à une coupe slim très féminine. À l’heure où toutes les fashionistas se ruent sur les chemises -boy de la nouvelle saison, ce modèle deviendra vite la pièce maîtresse de vos sorties ambiance country. Taillée dans un denim stretch très léger, cette chemise pour femme d’un magnifique marron dégradé est un modèle à la coupe et à la couleur top tendance.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Con la camicia da donna Western Shirt Light Stretch Denim Arabian Spice, i dettagli della classica camicia stile Western si sposano armoniosamente con le linee femminili e slim. In linea con le nuove tendenze boy, la camicia in stile Western di 7FAM diventa un capo irrinunciabile per le serate danzanti. In un denim stretch e leggero, color marrone intenso dalle molteplici sfaccettature, questa camicia da donna è una certezza in fatto di stile e colore.
configurable.i18n_description_es: The Western Shirt Light Stretch Denim Arabian Spice is a women’s shirt fusing classic Western shirt design details with slim-fitting, feminine tailoring. With stylistas reaching for boy shirts for the new season, 7FAM’s Western Shirt is your go-to piece for the most fashionable barn dance in town. Constructed in a lightweight stretch denim in a unique, multi-tonal rich brown hue, this women’s shirt is catwalk cool in both style and colour.
